abstract: In television appearances on Wednesday, Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief executive of Goldman Sachs, claimed that “my predecessors didn’t go to China.” That would be news to Henry M. Paulson Jr.
snippet: In television appearances on Wednesday, Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief executive of Goldman Sachs, claimed that “my predecessors didn’t go to China.” That would be news to Henry M. Paulson Jr.
lead_paragraph: On Wednesday morning on CNBC, Lloyd C. Blankfein, the chief of Goldman Sachs, made a rare on-camera appearance to defend the embattled firm from its detractors.
